item.title: A bot for Cyx
item.description: As a tracer bullet for the game of Go I’ve been working on for the past ten years (yes, it is a long time, and for my defense I re-wrote it from scratch a bunch of times), I made Cyx. It’s been highlighted in the Chrome Webstore lately, and since then thousands of players try it every day. You can only play it against a local friend or against the computer.
